task_description: Document and implement ALD purge step as a no-op/wait: update AGENTS.md to state that the purge step performs no valve or PLC actions and only waits for the configured duration; update step_flow purge implementation accordingly; ensure logging clarifies the behavior; run lint/type-check and relevant debug tests; deliver minimal diffs and verification steps; acceptance: AGENTS.md updated, purge step implementation conforms (no PLC writes except reading telemetry), tests pass, lint/type-check clean.
